Información Electoral Proximo Election Day - May 2, 2026 The City of Colorado City Council is composed of a Mayor, elected at large, and six (6) Council positions, elected from six geographically defined single member districts each serve two (2) year terms and are elected by the qualified votes of the City.  In 2026, the Council seats for District 3, District 4, and District 6 will be on the ballot. para el 3 4 el 6

Información Electoral Proximo Election Day - May 2, 2026 The City of Colorado City Council is composed of a Mayor, elected at large, and six (6) Council positions, elected from six geographically defined single member districts each serve two (2) year terms and are elected by the qualified votes of the City.  In 2025, the Council seats for District 3, District 4, and District 6 will be on the ballot. para el 3 4 el 6

Información Electoral Pasado Election Day: May 3, 2025

The City of Colorado City Council is composed of a Mayor, elected at large, and six (6) Council positions, elected from six geographically defined single member districts each serve two (2) year terms and are elected by the qualified votes of the City.  In 2025, the Council seats for Mayor , District 1, District 2, and District 5 will be on the ballot.

Información Electoral Election Day - May 4, 2024

The City of Colorado City Council is composed of a Mayor, elected at large, and six (6) Council positions, elected from six geographically defined single member districts each serve two (2) year terms and are elected by the qualified votes of the City.  In 2024, the Council seats for District 3, District 4, and District 6 will be on the ballot. Internet Posting Requirements for Political Subdivisions Notice of Deadline to File an Application for Place on the Ballot - 2024 Aviso De Fecha Limite Para Presentar Una Solicitud Para Un Lugar En La Boleta - 2024 Order of Election - May 4, 2024 Orden De Eleccion Para Municipios Notice of Election - May 4, 2024 Aviso De Eleccion General Order of Cancellation - May 4, 2024 Ejemplo De Orden De Cancelacion - Mayo 4, 2024

Información Electoral Election Day - May 6, 2023 Día de elección  de mayo, 2023

The City of Colorado City Council is composed of a Mayor, elected at large, and six (6) Council positions, elected from six geographically defined single member districts each serve two (2) year terms and are elected by the qualified votes of the City.  In 2023, the Council seats for Mayor , District 1, District 2, and District 5 will be on the ballot. Notice of Drawing for Place on the Ballot  -  2023 Order of Election - May 6, 2023 Notice Of General Election - May 6, 2023 Order of Cancellation - 2023

The City of Colorado City Council is composed of a Mayor, elected at large, and six (6) Council positions, elected from six geographically defined single member districts each serve two (2) year terms and are elected by the qualified votes of the City.  In 2022, the Council seats for District 3, District 4, and District 6 will be on the ballot.
